Description_lang: Healing or dealing damage has a chance to grant you a stack of Redirected Anima. Redirected Anima increases your maximum health by $342814s1% and your Mastery by $342814s2 for $342814d, and stacks overlap.$?(s152280&a137005)[Defile]?(a137005&!s152280)[Death's Due]?a212611[The Hunt]?a137009[Convoke the Spirits]?a137014[Wild Spirits]?a137018[Shifting Power]?a137022[Faeline Stomp]?a137026[Blessing of Seasons]?a137030[Fae Guardians]?a137034[Sepsis]?a137038[Fae Transfusion]?a137042[Soul Rot]?a137047[Ancient Aftershock]?a353167[Boon of the Covenants][Activating your Night Fae class ability] grants you ${$s3*$<mod>} stacks of Redirected Anima.
